1551121.content: A biyomon was flying around. It then got tired after a while and decided to rest. It landed on a branch and was about to rest before it heard something below the tree. The biyomon used its wings to straighten it out as it fell and the biyomon landed feet first into a warm liquid. The biyomon smiled as it landed safely and was about to fly back up when it realized that its feet were stuck. It looked down and saw that it landed in a very sticky purple goo. It tried pulling its feet off of the goo, but the goo pulled its feet back down. The goo then...
